Services

KapuNode.net provide a diversity of services through different subdomains.

explorer.kapunode.net

Kapu MainNet Explorer.
 

snapshot.kapunode.net

Kapu MainNet Blockchain Snapshot.
Always fast and up-to-date downloads.

api.kapunode.net

Kapu MainNet Secure Public API Endpoint.
Forging Locked.




MaiNET Blockchain Explorer


Kapu.one https://explorer.kapu.one/ CloudFlare Inc., USA
gsilvestri https://explorer.kapunode.net/ ScaleWay, Amsterdam, Netherlands


DevNET Blockchain Explorer


Kapu.one https://texplorer.kapu.one CloudFlare Inc., USA
gsilvestri https://dev.explorer.kapunode.net/ ScaleWay, Amsterdam, Netherlands


MaiNET Network Explorer


dafty https://arkstats.net Contabo, Nuremberg, Germany


MaiNET Blockchain Snapshots


Kapu.one https://explorer.kapu.one/snapshots/ CloudFlare Inc., USA
gsilvestri https://snapshot.kapunode.net ScaleWay, Amsterdam, Netherlands


MainNET SSL Public API


Kapu.one https://walletapi.kapu.one CloudFlare Inc., USA
gsilvestri https://api.kapunode.net ScaleWay, Amsterdam, Netherlands

DevNET SSL Public API


gsilvestri https://dev.api.kapunode.net ScaleWay, Amsterdam, Netherlands
